patthana24.3:1.1_0: Nahetu nasappaccayo dhammo hetussa sappaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana24.3:2.1_0: Ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā upanissaye tīṇi. (Saṅkhataṁ sappaccayasadisaṁ.)
patthana24.3:3.1_0: Nahetuṁ nasanidassanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu sanidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.3:4.1_0: Nahetu naanidassano dhammo hetussa anidassanassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana24.3:4.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā upanissaye purejāte atthiyā avigate tīṇi.
patthana24.3:5.1_0: Nahetuṁ nasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu sappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.3:6.1_0: Nahetuṁ naappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu appaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.3:7.1_0: Nahetuṁ narūpiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu rūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana24.3:8.1_0: Nahetuṁ naarūpiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu arūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.3:9.1_0: Nahetuṁ nalokiyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.3:9.1_1: Nanahetuṁ nalokiyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.3:10.1_0: Nahetuṁ nalokuttaraṁ dhammaṁ paccayā hetu lokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.3:11.1_0: Nahetuṁ nakenaci viññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu kenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.3:12.1_0: Nahetuṁ nakenaci naviññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu kenaci naviññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
